news.title: Turnstile Share Video for New Song “Look Out for Me”: Watch
news.summary: Singer Brendan Yates and guitarist Pat McCrory once again direct their experimental hardcore band’s latest visual

news.title: Salt-N-Pepa Sue Universal Music Group for Rights to Master Recordings
news.summary: Cheryl “Salt” James and Sandra “Pepa” Denton say they have the rights to reclaim ownership of hits including “Push It”

news.title: Blood Incantation Announce Summer 2025 North American Tour
news.summary: The Denver death-metal quartet’s Absolute Elsetour will take the group across the United States and Canada in support of the 2024 album Absolute Elsewhere

news.title: Hunx and His Punx Announce Tour and First Album in 12 Years, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: California punks Seth Bogart, Shannon Shaw, and Erin Emslie return, in August, with Walk Out on This World

news.title: Taylor Swift’s “Look What You Made Me Do (Taylor’s Version)” Airs on The Handmaid’s Tale
news.summary: A full Reputation (Taylor’s Version) has yet to be announced
